title: New Game Mode Idea: 4-Dimensional Rift
body:
So like, i absolutely love the idea of adding new game modes like U.R.F and One For All as such since they end up bringing hype and fun instead of just the average rift over Normals, ARAM and Ranked. 
Although a new recent game mode to celebrate the Bilgewaters has been created and just release on the PBE, i'd like to help give the Rioters a rough idea of my own game mode as well as community thoughts on the OCE Boards.
Dimensional Rift {{champion:161}} 
As the name suggests, this is a game mode where instead of having a short 20 minute average game, we'll have multiple maps on at the same time where there'll be dimensional rifts where you can enter/exit through to go to another map to defeat the enemy nexus and to make it even more hyped: add 1 more player to each team so Hexakill is possible and that the game play will be easier.
The objectives are to be the normal turrets and of course the enemy nexus however knowing when to push and defeat turrets will be the main attraction to this game mode as well as the possibility to go to each map through a dimensional rift. {{champion:432}} 
It is wanted that the Summoners Rift, Howling Abyss, Twisted Treeline and Crystal Scar will will be used and when one map has been taken, the whole map will not be able to be accessible through the dimensional rift (think of it like Vel'Koz's w or like a mini bard magical journey) but the focused enemy nexus is the key. The idea of having crystal scar is because of the timers and adds pressure to having look at where a member needs to be.
I don't know if there is a rule to the average game having to be around 20 minutes to surrender but that will be the time, and there surely must be a buff.
{{champion:222}} The Quick Let's Defeat their Nexus Buff {{champion:51}} 
User has twice the speed xp rate 
User does more damage to towers
User has 50 more movement speed
User has prolonged buffs
User does more damage to jungle minions
Summoner Cooldowns have been reduced
{{champion:69}} Initial Buffs{{champion:131}} 
When a team has secured a team buff when an ally is in another rift, they will also have that buff given to them.
Issues
Recalling time will be reduced, and will be possible at Howling Abyss (you don't have to die to be able to buy).
Items will all be included, even those that are unique to their own map however those with the same effect will both be put to cool down such as Wooglet's Witchcap and Zhonya's hourglass.
{{summoner:1}} Revive will make its way back because why not? {{item:3070}} 
How to win:
The first team to get 3 enemy nexus' will win, however if it is draw, then both teams will result in a draw or loss prevented. OR enter a SUDDEN DEATH where if they are hit, they instantly die and the one(s) who is left will win it for their team.

Well, this may be a tacky idea however i would think that this would be fun for all of the community.
What do you think?
{{champion:32}} Thanks for reading <3

replies.body:
Drop Crystal scar and just do it with TT, Howling Abyss and SR.

Best of 3 basically.

Though the thing is, why wouldn't you just rush one and then compete for the third?

That seems too complicated for a lot of the player base to grasp and handle. A lot of people can't even handle 1 map. Perhaps just scale it back to 2 maps (probably just SR and TT), have items switch between counterparts for each map (for example Infinity Edge for SR and Lord Van Damm's Pillager for TT) and no "sudden death". Maybe even have it so you can only be on each map for a certain amount of time to make it more interesting and to create some incentive to switch.
